subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Defensive end Mario Williams has endured endless and often repetitive questions since the Houston Texans chose him No. 1 over all in last year’s draft. There is one thing he wishes someone — anyone — would ask.
snippet: Defensive end Mario Williams has endured endless and often repetitive questions since the Houston Texans chose him No. 1 over all in last year’s draft. There is one thing he wishes someone — anyone — would ask.
